publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1060 Mr Tom McCabe on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Food Protection (Emergency Prohibitions) (Paralytic Shellfish Poisoning) (Orkney) (Scotland) Order 2000â€”That the Parliament agrees that the Food Protection (Emergency Prohibitions) (Paralytic Shellfish Poisoning) (Orkney) (Scotland) Order 2000 be approved. Supported by: Iain Smith*
